Package basecomponents

Class PhotoAlbum

java.lang.Object
basecomponents.PhotoAlbum
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class PhotoAlbum
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class used to create a photoalbum containing categories which have images It has a list of categories, a name and has a date of creation
Author:
gabri
See Also:
Serialized Form
